column4: However if you still insist on making your own distro from scratch with zero linux experience whatsoever, then feel free to try out www.linuxfromscratch.org
but be warned, there's a high chance of your system breaking if you don't know what you're doing >_<
one could even say that if the system doesn't break, then LFS is a failure. failure = learning :-)
not to the extent when your machine becomes completely inoperable.
